name: NorthPoleRadio
0:
”Alexa, open North Pole Radio”
”Ask North Pole Radio to get Saturday's update”
”Ask North Pole radio for the update for December 24th”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: north pole radio
des: Listen in to North Pole Radio station the entire month of December to find out what's going on in and around Santa's Workshop.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
